name: Alex Rivers
bio: Full-stack developer & AI enthusiast. Building the future of web3 and exploring the intersection of artificial intelligence and blockchain technology. Speaker, writer, and eternal learner.

articles.title: The Rise of Decentralized AI Networks
articles.description: Exploring how blockchain technology is revolutionizing artificial intelligence through decentralized computing networks and shared models.

articles.title: Building Scalable dApps with Next.js 14
articles.description: A comprehensive guide to creating high-performance decentralized applications using the latest features in Next.js and smart contracts.

blogs.title: The Future of Web Development in 2024
blogs.excerpt: Exploring emerging trends including AI-powered development tools, WebAssembly, and the evolution of frontend frameworks.

blogs.title: Optimizing Smart Contract Gas Consumption
blogs.excerpt: Deep dive into advanced techniques for reducing gas costs in Ethereum smart contracts without compromising functionality.

blogs.title: Building AI-Powered Code Reviews
blogs.excerpt: How to leverage large language models to automate and enhance the code review process in your development workflow.
